config:
0.8-beta4 bbb0.8-mconf-0.1 - Mconf Node (mconf.org) <help url="<%= :server_url %>/help.html"/> <porttest host="<%= :server_domain %>" application="video"/> <application uri="rtmp://<%= :server_domain %>/bigbluebutton" host="<%= :server_url %>/bigbluebutton/api/enter" />
<module name="ChatModule" url="ChatModule.swf?v=<%= :module_version %>" uri="rtmp://<%= :server_domain %>/bigbluebutton" dependsOn="ViewersModule" translationOn="false" translationEnabled="false" privateEnabled="true" position="top-right" />
<module name="ViewersModule" url="ViewersModule.swf?v=<%= :module_version %>" uri="rtmp://<%= :server_domain %>/bigbluebutton" host="<%= :server_url %>/bigbluebutton/api/enter" allowKickUser="false" windowVisible="true" />
<module name="ListenersModule" url="ListenersModule.swf?v=<%= :module_version %>" uri="rtmp://<%= :server_domain %>/bigbluebutton" recordingHost="<%= :server_url %>" windowVisible="true" position="middle-left" />
<module name="DeskShareModule" url="DeskShareModule.swf?v=<%= :module_version %>" uri="rtmp://<%= :server_domain %>/deskShare" autoStart="false" />
<module name="PhoneModule" url="PhoneModule.swf?v=<%= :module_version %>" uri="rtmp://<%= :server_domain %>/sip" autoJoin="true" skipCheck="false" showButton="true" enabledEchoCancel="true" dependsOn="ViewersModule" />
<module name="VideoconfModule" url="VideoconfModule.swf?v=<%= :module_version %>" uri="rtmp://<%= :server_domain %>/video" dependson = "ViewersModule" videoQuality = "100" presenterShareOnly = "false" resolutions = "160x120,320x240,640x480" autoStart = "false" showButton = "true" showCloseButton = "true" publishWindowVisible = "true" viewerWindowMaxed = "false" viewerWindowLocation = "top" camKeyFrameInterval = "30" camModeFps = "10" camQualityBandwidth = "0" camQualityPicture = "90" enableH264 = "false" h264Level = "2.1" h264Profile = "main" />
<module name="WhiteboardModule" url="WhiteboardModule.swf?v=<%= :module_version %>" uri="rtmp://<%= :server_domain %>/bigbluebutton" dependsOn="PresentModule" />
<module name="PresentModule" url="PresentModule.swf?v=<%= :module_version %>" uri="rtmp://<%= :server_domain %>/bigbluebutton" host="<%= :server_url %>" showPresentWindow="true" showWindowControls="true" dependsOn="ViewersModule" />
<module name="VideodockModule" url="VideodockModule.swf?v=<%= :module_version %>" uri="rtmp://<%= :server_domain %>/bigbluebutton" dependsOn="VideoconfModule, ViewersModule" autoDock="true" maximizeWindow="false" position="bottom-right" width="172" height="179" layout="smart" oneAlwaysBigger="false" />
<module name="LayoutModule" url="LayoutModule.swf?v=<%= :module_version %>" layoutConfig="conf/layout.xml" />
<module name="SharedNotesModule" url="SharedNotesModule.swf?v=<%= :module_version %>" uri="rtmp://<%= :server_domain %>/bigbluebutton" host="<%= :server_url %>/demo/notes.jsp" refreshDelay="500" responseTimeout="3000" enablePlayback="false" autoStart="true" dependsOn="ViewersModule" position="bottom-left" />
